column4: I am trying to install php5-curl on my machine..but I get the follwoing error....can anyone tell me what could be the reason?
I am trying to install php5-curl on my machine..but I get the follwoing error....can anyone tell me what could be the reason?
but i will take care in future
so..does that mean, i wont be able to install software on this?
is that the reason why i am getting this error?
yes, that is why you are getting those errors.  When a distro hits end of life, the repos "close".
read the 'EOL U pgrade" part of that link
no its not bizarre at all... do you break out your windows 3.x software, and try to install it on Win 7
but Ubuntu releases are quite too often...and also in case of windows the support doesnt stop so abruptly..
it's supported for 18months... if you want longer support, use an LTS release (3yrs)
so..what is the way out for me..i need to have the latest ubuntu installed..?
at this point though, the next LTS is in about 10mo, so... if you have really new hardware, installing 10.04 (the last LTS release) you might have some hardware recognition issues
did you read the link i gave you?
pay particular attention to the "looking to upgrade an EOL release" link.
